questions.mainQuestion: Can you tell me about things you used to enjoy — hobbies, outings, or small pleasures — and whether you still find them enjoyable?

subQuestions.text: What specific hobbies or activities did you used to enjoy the most?
How has your interest in these activities changed over time?
What prevents you from enjoying these activities now, if anything?
How do you feel when you think about the activities you used to enjoy?

questions.mainQuestion: When did you first notice a change in your mood or feelings?

subQuestions.text: Can you remember approximately when this change in your mood began?
Was there a specific event or situation that seemed to trigger this change?
How would you describe the nature of this mood change?
How has this mood change affected your ability to function in daily life?

questions.mainQuestion: How has your sleep been lately?

subQuestions.text: How many hours of sleep do you typically get per night now?
What specific sleep problems are you experiencing, if any?
How does your sleep quality affect how you feel during the day?
What do you think might be causing your sleep difficulties?

questions.mainQuestion: Have you noticed any changes in your appetite or weight?

subQuestions.text: How has your appetite changed compared to before?
Have you noticed any weight changes, and if so, how much?
How do these changes in appetite or weight make you feel?
Have you noticed any connection between your mood and your eating patterns?

questions.mainQuestion: How would you describe your energy levels?

subQuestions.text: How do your current energy levels compare to how you used to feel?
What activities or tasks are most affected by your energy levels?
How does having low energy impact your daily life?
What do you do to try to boost your energy, if anything?

questions.mainQuestion: How would you describe your ability to concentrate or make decisions?

subQuestions.text: How has your ability to focus or concentrate changed?
What challenges do you face when trying to make decisions now?
How do concentration or decision-making difficulties affect your work or daily tasks?
How do you feel when you notice these difficulties with concentration or decision-making?

questions.mainQuestion: How do you feel about yourself and your future?

subQuestions.text: What are your current thoughts and feelings about yourself?
How do you view your future prospects and possibilities?
Do you feel optimistic or pessimistic about things improving?
What would need to change for you to feel more hopeful about the future?

questions.mainQuestion: How would you describe your relationships with family and friends?

subQuestions.text: How have your relationships with family and friends changed recently?
Do you find yourself wanting to spend less time with people?
How do you feel when you interact with family and friends now?
How do you think your mood or feelings have affected your relationships?
